  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Enclosing class:
    PlayerOptionView

    public static class PlayerOptionView.PlayerOptionTabView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    PlayerOptionTabView is our Tab items, which is a RelativeLayout containing a PlayerOptionImageView (a trapezoid) and a TextView(the tab item's title)
